metrics.name: Average processing time for sales orders
metrics.description: Average time from the creation of a sales order item to its complete processing
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${processing_completion_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${sales_order_item_creation_events}))
	)

metrics.name: Average invoice payment time
metrics.description: Average number of days that it takes a company to collect payment after a sale
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${billing_clearing_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${billing_creation_events}))
	)

metrics.name: Return rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in which an item was returned
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (event_name ${return_order_events})
	))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: On-time delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of deliveries arriving at their destination before or on the expected date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (${ontime_delivery_condition})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${outbound_delivery_creation_events})))
	) 
* 100

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice was cleared after its due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (${invoice_overdue_condition})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${billing_clearing_events})))
	) 
* 100

metrics.name: No payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice is overdue and not cleared
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE ((${open_accounts_receivable_condition})
			AND (${no_payment_condition}))) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${billing_creation_events})))
	) 
* 100

metrics.name: Dunning rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice is dunned
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${dunning_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Lead time: sales document item creation to delivery creation
metrics.description: Average lead time from the event 'Create Sales Order Item' to the event 'Create Outbound Delivery'

metrics.name: Lead time: invoice creation to accounts receivable clearing
metrics.description: Average lead time for items that were cleared within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST("InvoiceAccountingClearingDate") WHERE 
		((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(${invoice_reference_date})WHERE 
		((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${invoice_posting_period}))
	)

metrics.name: Rejected sales document items
metrics.description: Number of rejected sales order items that were created within a time period

metrics.name: Return order items created
metrics.description: Number of return order items that were created within a time period

metrics.name: Deleted sales document items
metrics.description: Number of deleted items in sales documents within a defined period of time

metrics.name: Automation rate: sales document creation
metrics.description: Percentage of automated sales order creation events within a time period
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (
		(SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${sales_order_doc_creation_events})
		 AND (${otc_automation_condition}))
		 AND ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${sales_order_doc_creation_period})) 
	)
) / SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name)))
* 100

metrics.name: Overdue open Accounts Receivable items
metrics.description: Number of overdue open customer items
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE ("InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" IS NULL
		 AND "InvoiceDueDate" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))) > 0
	)

metrics.name: Average invoice customer process time
metrics.description: Average time from the posting of goods issue to the creation of an invoice
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN (${billing_creation_events}))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN (${shipping_events}))
)

metrics.name: Total number of sales orders
metrics.description: Total amount of orders on header level
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT SalesDocId) FILTER (
	 WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${sales_order_item_creation_events}))))

metrics.name: No-Touch-Order Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of “perfect orders” or no-touch orders, i.e. delivered on time, with the right amount and no other changes

metrics.name: Price Change Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with SD Item price changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ${price_change_events})))
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES((${sales_order_item_creation_events}))))
* 100

metrics.name: Delivery Change Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with SD Item delivery changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ${update_delivery_events})))
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES((${sales_order_item_creation_events}))))
* 100

metrics.name: Material Change Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with SD Item material changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES((${update_material_events}))))
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES((${sales_order_item_creation_events}))))
* 100

metrics.name: Quantity change rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with SD Item quantity changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES((${update_quantity_events}))))
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES((${sales_order_item_creation_events}))))
* 100

variables.name: sales_order_item_creation_events
variables.description: Events identifying the creation of a sales order, for example 'Create Sales Order Item'

variables.name: processing_completion_events
variables.description: Events identifying when a sales order is processed, for example 'Sales Order Completely Processed'

variables.name: billing_creation_events
variables.description: Events identifying the creation of invoices, for example 'Create Invoice'

variables.name: billing_clearing_events
variables.description: Events identifying that an invoice was cleared, for example 'Clear Invoice'

variables.name: return_order_events
variables.description: Events identifying that a sales order was returned, for example 'Create Return Sales Order Item'

variables.name: ontime_delivery_condition
variables.description: Condition defining that a delivery is on time, for example "DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime" = 'Yes'

variables.name: invoice_overdue_condition
variables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was cleared after the due date, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"

variables.name: no_payment_condition
variables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was not cleared, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" IS NULL

variables.name: dunning_condition
variables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has already been dunned, for example "InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL

variables.name: shipping_events
variables.description: Events identifying that the goods have been shipped, for example 'Post Goods Issue'

variables.name: invoice_reference_date
variables.description: Attributes identifying which field of the accounting document is used for the calculation of the lead time, for example: "InvoiceAccountingDocumentDate"

variables.name: invoice_clearing_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor cleared invoices, for example, for invoices that were cleared during last week: '7days'

variables.name: invoice_posting_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoices that have been paid, for example, for payments that have been paid at least 1 day ago: '1days'

variables.name: outbound_delivery_creation_events
variables.description: Events identifying that an Outbound Delivery has been created, for example: 'Create Outbound Delivery'

variables.name: outbound_delivery_period
variables.description: Reference time period in which outbound deliveries have been created, counting backward from today, for example: '7days'

variables.name: sales_order_item_creation_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order items that were created, for example, for sales order items that were created during last week: '7days'

variables.name: rejected_orders_reference_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order items that were rejected, for example, for sales order items that were rejected during last week: '7days'

variables.name: returned_orders_reference_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order items that were returned, for example, for sales order items that were returned during last week: '7days'

variables.name: sales_order_doc_creation_events
variables.description: Events referring to the creation of any sales document, for example: 'Create Sales Order Item', 'Create Contract Item'

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Create Sales Order Item', 'Create Contract Item', 'Create Return Sales Order Item', 'Create Sales Order Item w/o Charge', 'Create Credit Memo Request Item', 'Create Debit Memo Request Item'

variables.name: otc_automation_condition
variables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was automated, for example: "EventCreatedByUserType" != 'Dialog'

variables.name: sales_order_doc_creation_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order documents that were created, for example, for sales order documents that were created during last week: '7days'

variables.name: delete_sales_order_item_events
variables.description: Events identifying that a sales order item was deleted, for example: 'Delete Sales Doc Item'

variables.name: sales_order_item_deletion_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order items that were deleted, for example, for sales order items that were deleted during last week: '7days'

variables.name: open_accounts_receivable_condition
variables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has not been cleared so far, although it was expected to. For example: NOW() > "InvoiceDueDate"

variables.name: otc_change_events
variables.description: Events referring to changes made to the sales doc item, for example: 'Change Sales Doc Item Price'

variables.name: price_change_events
variables.description: Events referring to price changes made to the sales doc item

variables.name: update_delivery_events
variables.description: Events referring to delivery changes made to the sales doc item

variables.name: update_material_events
variables.description: Events indicating material changes made to the sales doc item

variables.name: update_quantity_events
variables.description: Events indicating quantity changes made to the sales doc item
